Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Trait yii\db\ActiveRelationTrait

All Classes | Properties | Methods
Implemented byyii\db\ActiveRelation, yii\redis\ActiveRelation
Available since version2.0
Source Code
ActiveRelationTrait implements the common methods and properties for active record relation classes.

Public Properties

Hide inherited properties

PropertyTypeDescriptionDefined By
$multiple boolean Whether this relation should populate all query results into AR instances yii\db\ActiveRelationTrait
$primaryModel yii\db\ActiveRecord The primary model that this relation is associated with yii\db\ActiveRelationTrait
$link array The columns of the primary and foreign tables that establish the relation yii\db\ActiveRelationTrait
$via array The query associated with the pivot table yii\db\ActiveRelationTrait

Public Methods

Hide inherited methods

MethodDescriptionDefined By
__clone() Clones internal objects. yii\db\ActiveRelationTrait
via() Specifies the relation associated with the pivot table. yii\db\ActiveRelationTrait
populateRelation() Finds the related records and populates them into the primary models. yii\db\ActiveRelationTrait

Property Details

$multiple property
boolean $multiple = null

Whether this relation should populate all query results into AR instances. If false, only the first row of the results will be retrieved.

$primaryModel property
yii\db\ActiveRecord $primaryModel = null

The primary model that this relation is associated with. This is used only in lazy loading with dynamic query options.

$link property
array $link = null

The columns of the primary and foreign tables that establish the relation. The array keys must be columns of the table for this relation, and the array values must be the corresponding columns from the primary table. Do not prefix or quote the column names as this will be done automatically by Yii.

$via property
array $via = null

The query associated with the pivot table. Please call via() to set this property instead of directly setting it.

Method Details

__clone() method
void __clone( )

Clones internal objects.

via() method
static via( $relationName, $callable = null )
$relationName string The relation name. This refers to a relation declared in $primaryModel.
$callable callable A PHP callback for customizing the relation associated with the pivot table. Its signature should be function($query), where $query is the query to be customized.
return static the relation object itself.

Specifies the relation associated with the pivot table.

populateRelation() method
array populateRelation( $name, &$primaryModels )
$name string The relation name
$primaryModels array Primary models
return array the related models
throws yii\base\InvalidConfigException if $link is invalid

Finds the related records and populates them into the primary models.
